channel.title: Client error
channel.description:
Hi. I changed IP in gui from localhost to my no-ip. Then when client opens(I also changed client background) it says requesting title screen then gets stuck and error connecting 5-4-3-2-1 etc.
Help me please

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @rang3_pkz rang3 pkz
item.description:
@rang3_pkz wrote:

So in the egui it shows “localhost” “localhost” “localhost” on his computer. He was able to connect then. But when I change IP to the numbers,or the no-ip it won’t work.

So what your saying is,Change the IP to the no-ip and have him upload client and see if I can get on it?

Matt

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

if the server is being hosted on his computer, then he should be connecting to localhost, or 127.0.0.1. only clients connecting from other computers should use the ip redirect.

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @rang3_pkz rang3 pkz
item.description:
@rang3_pkz wrote:

K guys I used teamviewer,and went on my friends files. I changed his IP for client to the no-ip and it said error connecting(Trying to login from his own computer). I also tried making his IP with the numbers he has for his IP. Both times I got error connecting when trying to use client from his computer.

Any help?

Matt

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

Should be posted in the Client Section

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @headlights headlights
item.description:
@headlights wrote:

In that case, you probably haven’t port-forwarded.

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @rang3_pkz rang3 pkz
item.description:
@rang3_pkz wrote:

See thing is,I was using localhost. Then I changed it to the no-ip and sent to my friend whose hosting. From there we got the connection error upon loading client. But at my computer it loaded fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @headlights headlights
item.description:
@headlights wrote:

You haven’t given us much information.

Is your server online, as well as no-ip?

Read full topic
